Title: Series: Les images de tous les saincts et saintes de l'année
Series: Les images de tous les saints et saintes de l'année
Description: Four oval scenes, each related to religious events or saints celebrated in April; from left to right and top to bottom, a Bishop saint sleeping outside a house, with group of figures approaching from the background (St Hugues of Grenoble's day); monk seated in profile to left with book in his hands, and looking up (St Francis of Paola's Day); a saint ploughing a field (St Richard's Day); a female saint, with her naked body covered by her hair, standing in a landscape (St Mary of Egypt's Day). c.1632/35 Etching
Curator's comments: From a set of 124 plates (a title, a frontispiece and 122 plates of 4 scenes each), see 1861,0713.511 for comment.
Bibliographic references: Meaume 1860 / Recherches sur la vie et les ouvrages de Jacques Callot (302-425)
Associated names: Representation of: St Hughes of Grenoble
Representation of: St Francis of Paola
Representation of: St Richard of Chichester
Representation of: St Mary of Egypt
Acquisition notes: From the Scarisbrick collection of Callot's work: see comment on 1861,0713.1.
